00017 struct cfgBody {
00018         char *devTy;    // Device type string (case preserved)
00019         wdev_t devTyNum;        // Device type index number ((enum) see DeviceNames.h)

00022         char ***vals;   // 2-D Array of vals.  Same number of rows as
